page.description: The table below summarizes the RTF object properties. Use of the following properties requires the pointer returned by the RTF.CREATE() method.

case.title: .BINARY_TEXT
case.description: Gets the binary value of the RTF object.

case.title: .PLAIN_TEXT
case.description: Gets the plain text in the RTF object.

case.title: .RTF_TEXT
case.description: Gets the ASCII encoded text in the RTF object.

case.title: .STYLE
case.description: Gets a pointer to the array containing the style names.
